info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 8:29PM MDT until August 29 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LEWIS AND CLARK COUNTY... At 828 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 20 miles west of Augusta to 15 miles southwest of Wolf Creek, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Canyon Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
